Text: Sorry everyone but I'm having a problem with the internet in my building. Someone screwed up the main router in my condo and I'm without internet till Friday. Possibly even till Saturday. I will be back up and seeding like a mad man asap.
Running on a wireless USB network adapter picking up a fat wireless signal:) Download away:)
Where's the sound?  There is no sound on the disk beyond the menus.  No commentary, no anything on the disk for audio except for the menu screen music.  Do not download.  Thanks.
